thread.title: Reebok’s Shaq Attaq Returns in Celebration of Its 25 Anniversary
thread.title_full: Reebok’s Shaq Attaq Returns in Celebration of Its 25 Anniversary

author: Jonathan Sawyer
title: Reebok’s Shaq Attaq Returns in Celebration of Its 25 Anniversary
text:
Visit the original post to see all 4 images from this gallery. 
Reebok is gearing up to celebrate the 25th anniversary of Shaquille O’Neal ‘s iconic Shaq Attaq sneaker by retroing the model for just the second time ever. The hoops shoe was originally released back in 1992, when Shaq was in peak form for the Orlando Magic.
Here we find the Shaq Attaq featuring the brand’s signature Pump technology, as well as a Graphlite midfoot shank, the first use of carbon fiber in a basketball sneaker ever. Also boasting the OG Orlando Magic-inspired colorway, you can look forward to the Shaq Attaq returning on January 20 at select retailers and reebok.com .
For more Reebok heat, take a look at the insane Vetements x Reebok Instapump Fury.
